item.title: By: Jordan
item.dc:creator: Jordan
item.description: Hahahaha oh man I loved this story. Can you imagine what the guy was thinking? "Oh my...this isn't going nearly as awesomely as I hoped.....uh....I gotta go now....byy-yy-e...."
item.content:encoded: Hahahaha oh man I loved this story. Can you imagine what the guy was thinking? “Oh my…this isn’t going nearly as awesomely as I hoped…..uh….I gotta go now….byy-yy-e….”
